title: Issue 348
summary: Release Candidate 2 - wow, that happened fast!

items.description:
G'day everyone, welcome to issue #348 of Weekly Xamarin - a wrap-up of the community articles around Xamarin and MAUI communities this week.

The big news this week is the release of RC2 of MAUI. Speaking of Release Candidates, Mac people can now have fun with the VS2022 for Mac Release Candidate too!

If you live in the right time zones on May 3 there looks to be some really cool sessions happening live over on twitch at the Snorkelling in MAUI event hosted by Sam Basu and Friends. Unfortunately, it will be the middle of the night here in Australia so I sure hope they record the sessions. But if you can make it to the sessions this should be amazing!

Anyway, I hope you all have a lovely weekend and great week ahead,

Kym
items.description_markdown:
G'day everyone, welcome to issue #348 of Weekly Xamarin - a wrap-up of the community articles around Xamarin and MAUI communities this week.

The big news this week is the release of RC2 of MAUI. Speaking of Release Candidates, Mac people can now have fun with the VS2022 for Mac Release Candidate too!

If you live in the right time zones on May 3 there looks to be some really cool sessions happening live over on twitch at the [Snorkelling in MAUI event](https://twitter.com/Telerik/status/1519322630200901632) hosted by Sam Basu and Friends. Unfortunately, it will be the middle of the night here in Australia so I sure hope they record the sessions. But if you can make it to the sessions this should be amazing!

Anyway, I hope you all have a lovely weekend and great week ahead,

Kym

items.title: Visual Studio 2022 for Mac Release Candidate
items.description:
The Visual Studio 2022 for Mac 17.0 Release Candidate (RC) is ready for you to download now and includes a go-live license that allows you to develop in production environments.

Visual Studio 2022 for Mac Release Candidate by Jordan Matthiesen
items.description_markdown:
The Visual Studio 2022 for Mac 17.0 Release Candidate (RC) is ready for you to download now and includes a go-live license that allows you to develop in production environments.

items.title: The Ultimate Guide To Push Notifications For Developers
items.description:
What are the benefits of using push notifications and what can you use them for? In this article, Lee Munroe explains how to implement them and which practices are best to follow.

The Ultimate Guide To Push Notifications For Developers by Lee Munroe

items.title: Top 10 Features of .NET MAUI Scheduler
items.description:
Syncfusion’s .NET MAUI Scheduler component has nine built-in configurable view modes that provide all the common scheduling functionalities. This blog post highlights some of it's top features.

Top 10 Features of .NET MAUI Scheduler by Jeyasri Murugan
items.description_markdown:
Syncfusion’s .NET MAUI Scheduler component has nine built-in configurable view modes that provide all the common scheduling functionalities. This blog post highlights some of it's top features.

[**Top 10 Features of .NET MAUI Scheduler**](https://www.syncfusion.com/blogs/post/top-10-features-of-net-maui-scheduler.aspx) by [Jeyasri Murugan]()

items.title: The .NET MAUI Community Toolkit: Converters, Controls and More!
items.description:
The .NET MAUI Community Toolkit is a community-created library that contains .NET MAUI Extensions, Converters, Advanced UI/UX Controls, and Behaviors to help make your life as a .NET MAUI developer easier! In this video we will learn about the history of the .NET MAUI Community Toolkit and how to get started yourself!

The .NET MAUI Community Toolkit: Converters, Controls and More! by Gerald Versluis
items.description_markdown:
The .NET MAUI Community Toolkit is a community-created library that contains .NET MAUI Extensions, Converters, Advanced UI/UX Controls, and Behaviors to help make your life as a .NET MAUI developer easier! In this video we will learn about the history of the .NET MAUI Community Toolkit and how to get started yourself!

[**The .NET MAUI Community Toolkit: Converters, Controls and More!**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=wwG0BVMkDb8) by [Gerald Versluis](https://twitter.com/jfversluis)

embedded_links.title: **The .NET MAUI Community Toolkit: Converters, Controls and More!**

items.title: What is .NET MAUI? How does it work? What about Blazor Hybrid?
items.description:
It is time to answer that question that you all have been asking.. What exactly is .NET MAUI, how is it architected, how do I get started, and how does it differ from other frameworks. I break down each and every aspect of .NET MAUI and how you can build apps and also blend in Blazor Hybrid to leverage more code across iOS, Android, macOS, and Windows with C#.

What is .NET MAUI? How does it work? What about Blazor Hybrid? by James Montemagno
items.description_markdown:
It is time to answer that question that you all have been asking.. What exactly is .NET MAUI, how is it architected, how do I get started, and how does it differ from other frameworks. I break down each and every aspect of .NET MAUI and how you can build apps and also blend in Blazor Hybrid to leverage more code across iOS, Android, macOS, and Windows with C#.

[**What is .NET MAUI? How does it work? What about Blazor Hybrid?**](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KmLQLSKqvvI) by [James Montemagno](https://twitter.com/jamesmontemagno)

embedded_links.title: **What is .NET MAUI? How does it work? What about Blazor Hybrid?**
